Deadfur got the message on the Watchers-only frequency. He was not too
plea=
sed with the news. As soon as he could, he opened a line with
Cryonosis.

D=
eadfur: Deadfur reporting. I'm assisting the Maxies in Relay as per
emergen=
cy protocols and I'm directing the defenses against that brute.
I require f=
urther instructions and backups, my Lord. Oh, and just how
large is that co=
ming Pred force?

He ducked as something blew up nearby.

oogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:

eader.

that The Watchers have set up
around the planet.

nal. Something new.
Something different.

happened=

order it but =
